Package staff

Class StaffManager

  • Object
    • RestaurantManager
      • StaffManager
  • public class StaffManager
extends RestaurantManager
    Manages staff information in the restaurant list database through a CLI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StaffManager​(Restaurant restaurant)
      Initialises the manager with a restaurant object for data storage and manipulation.

      • display

        private void display​(int which)
        Maps to the various methods to run. Used as some methods throw exceptions, which will be caught by this method for logging purposes.
        Parameters:
        which - Which method to run.

      • viewStaff

        private void viewStaff()
                throws Exception
        Displays all staff information.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while displaying the staff information.

      • addStaff

        private void addStaff()
               throws Exception
        Adds a staff into the restaurant list database.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while adding the item.

      • manageStaff

        private void manageStaff()
                  throws Exception
        Manages staff information in the restaurant list database. Calls updateStaffInfo and removeStaff as needed.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while managing the staff information.

      • updateStaffInfo

        private void updateStaffInfo​(Staff staff,
                             int action)
                      throws Exception
        Updates a staff's information in the restaurant list database.
        Parameters:
        staff - Staff obtained from the calling function.
        action - Action the user chose in the calling function
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while updating staff information

      • removeStaff

        private void removeStaff​(Staff staff)
                  throws Exception
        Removes a staff's information in the restaurant list database.
        Parameters:
        staff - Staff obtained from the calling function.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while removing staff information

      • getDisplayList

        private List<String> getDisplayList​(int sortOption)
                             throws Exception
        Formats the data objects obtained from the restaurant list database into table-friendly format.
        Parameters:
        sortOption - Determines which comparator to sort the formatted list by.
        Returns:
        List of formatted object data. One object per entry.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while obtaining data objects.
